Articles.Content: Ugh. In flight part clipping is so annoying. Post your struggles here

The reason parts can do this, IIRC, is that there was an issue with parts on the same vessel being able to collide with each other. I forget exactly what the issue was, maybe it was lag, maybe it was vessel fragility, or whatever, but whatever it was, it was fixed by making parts on the same vessel unable to collide with each other.

Apparently the problem was worse than the solution, and the clipping won't show up if you have designed your vessel properly (autostruts, normal struts, etc).
